fullText:
Psychic Feast

Prerequisite: Longtooth shifter, longtooth shifting racial power, any psionic class
Benefit: While you benefit from longtooth shifting and when you hit with an attack on your turn, your regeneration increases by 2 until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 389.
name: Psychic Feast

benefit: While you benefit from longtooth shifting and when you hit with an attack on your turn, your regeneration increases by 2 until the end of your next turn.
